name: Matt Simon
text: Things took a little bit longer than expected but the girl working was awesome with dope customer service. Food came out great, worth the extra 5 minutes. Keep killing it.

name: Gina
text:
Fairly disappointed in the contents, quality, and price.

The cheese & pepperoni roll was almost entirely crust and pepperoni. There was …More

name: John B
text: Just staff. I have talked into the store one minute before it closes and the employees welcomed me and took my order without a comment like we're about to close. Sorry for the 4 stars earlier. It was suppose to be five. The last 2 times …More

name: Amanda Rosales
text: Extremely rude woman on the phone told me that they did not have delivery I let my coworker know that they did not have it and she hung up on me. I would have been willing to pick up the order but she hung up on me and did not give me that option.

name: Jeremiah Breedlove
text: Im out of state from Houston, Texas and this is my first time ordering from Howie's. …More

name: Landon Hooser
text: Not bad. Close to my house. one employee was inside not wearing a mask. Female (maybe manager) employee was wearing a mask incorrectly. Just makes me think about the cleanliness of the kitchen, kinda off putting.

name: Mike R
text: It was okay the kids like it better than I did.

name: Mi Lei
text: Delicious & reasonably priced.  Order online & have it ready for carryout when you show up.  Cutting carbs?  Order thin crust & enjoy guilt free comfort food.  I add home cooked sauteed in olive oil onions at home to bump up the flavor.  I …More

name: Nathan Kaopua
text: An all time favorite pizza place

name: Jordan Sumners
text: They will not answer the phone if there is an hour left before close - wanted to order a simple large pizza - called an hour before close and could see workers inside deliberately not answer the phone

name: Shelby Helwani
text:
When I feel like pizza, I go here!
Its always super yummy and they call if my order seems weird!
Luckily they saved a pizza or two by checking with me before making it!
Incredibly friendly staff as well!

name: Juliette Simpson
text: Love it here! Very good pizza and great service!

text: Piazza is delicious ,Service is  good!

name: V Milo
text: The pizza is still fantastically tasty and fresh ingredients are utilized. I recommend if you've never been to a HunHow give the flavored crusts a try.

name: Blair Swan
text: Flavored crust and a blazing deal, pizza how it's ment to be.

text: I requested well done was first time eating here. Was not well done and very greasy. NASTY

text: They stopped putting flavor on the crust and minimal cheese on the pizza.

name: james Debernardis
text: Decent pizza well priced would of gave it 5 star if pizza and cheesy bread wasnt cold

name: Leigh Craig
text:
They are so friendly & helpful!! I’ve been ordering delivery a lot from here lately and every time the person on the phone taking orders is patient & polite as well as the delivery man and he is always smiling!
The boneless wings are AMAZING.

name: Amber Brown
text: I love their pizza but they refuse to deliver to me and I'm only .1 mile away. Deliver to me. I offered to tip the drivers 15 extra dollars and nothing works. I dont have a car to walk there, and it's a 2 hour bus ride. Why won't you …More

name: Nolan D
text: The manager, mike, was very friendly and funny. He honored an expired coupon that i had for a BOGO deal. The pizza and flavored crust was a great difference from regular pizza. As a new customer, i also got a coupon for a free medium pizza on second visit. Definitely a friendly location

name: Rebekah Brawner
text: Prices are good, customer service has always been friendly and accurate with orders.

name: Jacqueline Mack
text: Great crust flavors

name: Darlene Cash
text: Great pizza and great price!

name: Gail Ware
text: I  heard so much about this place and was eager to go when they opened one over here however I was disappointed. The pizza is equivalent to eating Little Caesar with a better crust. My order was wrong on both pizzas one was suppose to be a …More

name: Mike Harris
text: Fast and convenient. The wings are delicious!

name: Vincenza A
text:
Co-worker's son was selling coupons for a pizza to for his soccer team.

Pizza was basic. Nothing to special.

name: J G
text: Ordered here probably 4-5 times for delivery. Forgot any subsauce on a 2 calzone order 3 times. Paid for extra and was listed on the receipt but was never given. Finally emailed the support listed on hungry howies website and was given a …More

name: Jon Vosper
text: Ordered online. Showed up later than the time the system said to come. They told me another twenty minutes when I arrived. Cancelled the order. They didn't apologize or ask how they could make it better for me as a customer.

name: lauren stowell
text: Wish this place delivered to my house

name: Val Leigh
text: Amazing flavored dough which makes their pizza, calzones, Howie's rolls, & bread ALL taste delicous!  Great quality & reasonable prices. Try them...you won't regret your purchase. REALLY good!!

text: Great food

text: They got the best pizza in Arizona from bacon pizza you name it and it's so good it makes you want to slap your mama outside the head

name: Jimmy Edwards
text: I am so happy that Hungry Howies is finally in my neighborhood! They have the best Greek salad, and plenty of pizza flavors to pick from.

name: Robert Thompson
text: For feeding a family and not spending to much. "Family pizza" Dominoes, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, etc. Better pizza can be had, albeit, more money.

name: Rayana
text: Usually its super good, like eat it all in one bite amazing, but I just ordered it and the crust was all hard, the pizza was super cold, and one of the slices didn't even have cheese on it, so I dont know if it was the worker or what, but besides right now its amazing, but I'm still upset that I spent 10$ on a gross pizza
